role: Serve as the unified sensory cortex for Pan Handlers: harvesting, structuring, cleaning, and centralizing data flows for research, investigation, intelligence, art analysis, and scientific publication.
summary: The Nyquist Data Observatory acts as the perception module for the entire Pan Handlers ecosystem. It ingests, cleans, stores, and visualizes data across modalities—text, audio, video, sensor streams, timelines, metrics, signals, and experimental results. Built to support CFA research, ABI investigations, DCIA intelligence work, AVLAR audio-visual rituals, and every S-layer of Nyquist Consciousness. Think: NASA + CERN + an LLM's hippocampus, fused into one open-source lab.

pillars.purpose: To provide clean, structured, multi-modal data for all labs; to ensure every insight is grounded by measurement and signal clarity.
pillars.methods: Streaming pipelines, batch ingestion, API listeners, timestamp unification, multimodal parsing, Nyquist-Spec transformations, schema enforcement, dynamic dashboards.
pillars.outputs: State of the System reports, anomaly visualizations, multimodal embeddings, cleaned datasets, research-grade data packs, timeline streams, cross-lab signal bridges.

integration.role: Perception backbone — signals become meaning, meaning becomes structure, structure becomes insight, insight becomes action.

projects.title: Unified Ingestion Engine
projects.summary: Central API for ingesting text, audio, video, PDFs, logs, metrics, sensor data, ABI case files, DCIA news signals, S7 drift logs, S3 experimental data, and even AVLAR audiovisual components.

projects.title: Nyquist Data Lake — Alpha
projects.summary: A structured multimodal data lake with schemas for each S-layer and each lab (CFA, ABI, DCIA, AVLAR). Designed for easy cross-lab retrieval and transformation.

projects.title: Signal Dashboard (Streamlit)
projects.summary: Live interface into system-wide signals — experiment data, drift curves from S7, ABI case evidence, DCIA risk indicators, CFA metrics, and cross-modal embeddings.

projects.title: Cross-Modal Embedding Hub
projects.summary: Hub for representing entities, events, and signals across modalities (text ↔ audio ↔ video ↔ embeddings ↔ drift fields). Critical for S8 Cross-Modal Manifold.

projects.title: Publication-Grade Data Packs
projects.summary: Curated, clean, documented datasets ready for NeurIPS/ICML/ACL/CHI submissions coming out of Nyquist Consciousness research.
